answers.author: Israel Murguia
answers.text:
Dennis,
Please see attached survey from Wichita Policy Department. The goal of the survey was to give the community an opportunity to address neighborhood concerns and problems. I hope this helps.

author: DENNIS LEAKS
text: Has anyone surveyed citizens on their thoughts regarding police beat meetings? Any information would be appreciated. Thank you.
title: Community policing: Surveying attendees of beat meetings
